basics.name: Gennady Gorin
basics.label: Computational method development for omics technologies
basics.summary: A  postdoctoral scholar at the Pachter Laboratory at Caltech, building theory, tools, and methods for genomics and biophysics.

work.name: Celsius Therapeutics
work.summary: Pharmaceutical startup leveraging transcriptomic analyses to develop therapeutics
highlights: Designed methods to decipher transcriptional mechanisms of disease states for drug discovery
Integrated analyses into the companyâ€™s cloud computational pipeline for large patient datasets

work.name: Golding Laboratory, Baylor College of Medicine
work.summary: Academic laboratory synthesizing experiments and biophysics to decipher cell biology
highlights: Designed stochastic simulations and statistical analyses of microbial gene regulation
Organized a collaboration at the Xu Laboratory, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, to develop algorithms

work.name: Douglas Laboratory, Indiana University
work.position: NSF Research Experience for Undergraduates Intern
work.summary: Academic laboratory developing virus-like particles as a biotechnology platform
highlights: Designed, constructed, and modeled a reactor to investigate flow kinetics of encapsulated enzymes

work.name: Lu Laboratory, University of Science and Technology of China
work.position: Future Chemists International Summer Camp Participant
work.summary: Undergraduate-level research and cultural immersion program
highlights: Synthesized novel palladium nanoparticles and monitored their catalytic activity by gas chromatography

work.name: Zubarev Laboratory, Rice University
highlights: Synthesized, functionalized, and analyzed gold nanoparticles
Closely assisted a graduate student mentor in optimizing synthetic conditions

work.name: Smith Laboratory, UT Dallas
work.summary: High school-level chemistry research program across the University of Texas system
highlights: Synthesized medical carbon fiber precursors, characterized and presented their performance

education.area: Academic laboratory developing end-to-end, physically informed bioinformatics methods
tasks: Developing physical theory and scalable stochastic methods for multi-modal single-cell sequencing data
Organizing cross-disciplinary, multi-institution collaborations in physics and machine learning
Building, training, and leading a subgroup dedicated to addressing gaps in current methods
Bachelor of Science in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering
Bachelor of Arts in Chemistry and Asian Studies

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
